result: A stranger approaches you and challenges you to a fight.
You do not feel as though it is within your power to deny your opponent this challenge.
Hey you!
I challenge you to a duel!
Prepare yourself!
Your opponent drops to the ground exhausted.
Before you realise what's happening they have already disappeared.
You see something glimmer from behind a rock.
The ground trembles as the air grows thick with heat.
It was already hot, but this is much worse. Something is wrong.
That's when you notice it, a large red beast flying down to you.
You tread upon my lands. This mountain, this sky, this breath of wind.. they all bow to me.
My body and soul keep the flames of the basalt cliffs alive.
I won't let your presence go unnoticed. Prepare yourself.
WHHHAAAAT! How did you win? I'm meant to be strong???
Give me some time, I'll... I'll... I don't know but I will win next time.
After besting the dragon, it seemed to have a personality change lol.
Perhaps it was all a front to scare you.
You continue with your journey.
You come across a large pond. The surface lies calm and silent.
Suddenly, the ground trembles beneath you
Bubbles rise from the water as something big and blue stirs beneath the pond.
A giant blue frog bursts out, blinking slowly with a blank, emotionless stare that says it's strong... but not smart.
RRIBBITTT! Tiny food? Walking food?
It flicks it's tongue toward you, misses and slaps itself in the face...
OUCH!!!
Frog fall down but frog bounce back later.
With a panicked croak, it spins around and bounds away crashing through the reeds and vanishing deep into the woods.
A slick pool of glowing purple venom remains
You carefully bottle it before it fades away.

Something glimmers between the cracks of the altar...
You pick up a small amulet shaped like a coiled snake.
